text: Segodnya razresheny vam blaga; i pishcha tekh, komu darovano pisaniye, razreshayetsya vam i vasha pishcha razreshayetsya im. I tselomudrennyye iz veruyushchikh i tselomudrennyye iz tekh, komu darovano pisaniye do vas, yesli vy im dali ikh voznagrazhdeniye, buduchi tselomudrennymi, ne rasputnichaya i ne berya nalozhnits. A yesli kto otreksya ot very, to u nego - delo tshchetno, i on v posledney zhizni - v chisle poterpevshikh ubytok
